text: Ara yara sirka kareche, tara balala, allahâ€Œ icche karale amara o amadera pitrpurusera tamke chara an'ya kono kichura ibadata karatama na [1]. Ara kono kichu tamke chariye harama'o ghosana karatama na [2]. Tadera purbabartira erupa'i karata. Rasulaganera kartabya ki sudhu suspasta bani pauche deya naya
